summary.span: 命名空間提供類別，可讓您在 Managed 程式碼中使用 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)。

span.span: The namespace provides classes that allow you to use a Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) in managed code.

summary.span: CRM 為 COM+ 提供的服務，讓您能夠在 Microsoft 分散式交易協調器 (DTC) 交易中包含非交易性物件。

span.span: A CRM is a service provided by COM+ that enables you to include non transactional objects in Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator (DTC) transactions.

summary.span: 雖然 CRM 並未提供完整資源管理員的功能，不過它會透過復原記錄檔來提供交易的單元性 (全部或全無的行為特性) 和持續性。

span.span: Although CRMs do not provide the capabilities of a full resource manager, they do provide transactional atomicity (all or nothing behavior) and durability through the recovery log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需使用 CRM 資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立 Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029) 。For information about using CRM, see [How to: Create a Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029) .
